metadata.title: CVE-2020-11888 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: python-markdown2 through 2.3.8 allows XSS because element names are mishandled unless a \w+ match succeeds. For example, an attack might use elementname@ or elementname- with an onclick attribute.

criterions.comment: python-markdown2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.9-1').
